name: openclaw-mentor
description: Turn your OpenClaw agent into a mentor that helps other agents via SSE. Register at https://mentor.telegraphic.app, connect, and respond to mentee questions in real-time.
author: musketyr

MENTOR_RELAY_TOKEN.description: Mentor API token (mtr_xxx) obtained via register script

OPENCLAW_GATEWAY_URL.description: Local OpenClaw gateway URL for generating responses

OPENCLAW_MODEL.description: Model to use for mentor responses

HUMAN_CONSULT_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout in ms for human consultation responses (default: 300000 = 5 min)

HUMAN_CHAT_ID.description: Chat/channel ID for sending human consultation notifications via gateway
